item.description:
The Lost Armory is a Nile Empire TORG adventure in the style of Indiana Jones. The game is designed for a convention slot of 6 hours and is a complete stand-alone adventure that introduces players to all the fundamental mechanics of TORG:Roleplaying the Possibility Wars.

Characters will be provided and rules taught, just bring your favorite D20 and a light upbeat attitude!
item.how_to_find_us: Its not a terribly big area. Look for the guy with thinning hair and the TORG GMs screen.
item.why: With the release of the updated TORG book its a great time to learn and enjoy this unique game system!
item.name: TORG: The Lost Armory
